In member i assistance you rendered me in 1911 Cohen e went home, and I wonder if you will do me it find meso ub arranging a loan for of $300 for four" kronetes jne keme takk Jam sure I can return to same plus interest shortly after I I get home, Sheld you be able to secara me tu uloney please send me the same as soon as you can and I shall be deeply undebled to yaagaw You Visi "be unterested to kuow shalt I have been working for experience at the firm of Charles a le and shalluck Adilets of town for the location. metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with details about Miss Lee's medical condition, Kwan's return to China after completing his studies at Harvard, and requesting a loan of $300 for that trip (Pages 1 and 4)
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
